I’m in too deep, Karla decides about an hour into their visit.

It’s so easy to forget the predicament he’s in when he’s not being berated. The mask cuts off the outside world and practically provides a safe cocoon for him to drift into if he lets his thoughts wander far enough away. 

The weather is just pleasant enough to not make the suit uncomfortable, and Karla’s chest rises and falls peacefully as he basks in the summer sun - wriggling appropriately when he’s given belly and bulge rubs, whining when his nipples are pinched.

He and his friends had seen the types of men to go in there, not to mention the noises that came out of it. Their little pup would never see it coming, unless one of the clients paid to take off the mask.

After paying a fee, the bullies start to set up in an empty bedroom, lying Karla down on his back on the mattress. The room is a bit hot, no air conditioning to be found. After making a price list of services, they soon get a few interested clients. The first man to fuck Karla lubes up before sliding in, several men outside the room waiting for their turns as he pounds away.
